item.title: Tiffany add a quote by Jane Austen
item.description: "I am only resolved to act in that manner, which will, in my own opinion, constitute my happiness, without reference to you, or to any person so wholly unconnected with me." -- Jane Austen

item.title: Tiffany add a quote by Jane Austen
Tiffany add a quote by Jane Austen
item.description: "He is a gentleman, and I am a gentleman's daughter. So far we are equal." -- Jane Austen

item.title: Tiffany add a quote by Jane Austen
item.description: "It is happy for you that you possess the talent of flattering with delicacy. May I ask whether these pleasing attentions proceed from the impulse of the moment, or are they the result of previous study?" -- Jane Austen

item.title: Tiffany add a quote by Eric Roth
item.description: "Our lives are defined by opportunities, even the ones we miss." -- Eric Roth

item.title: Tiffany add a quote by Jane Austen
item.description: "There is a stubbornness about me that never can bear to be frightened at the will of others. My courage always rises at every attempt to intimidate me." -- Jane Austen

item.title: Tiffany add a quote by Jim Gaffigan
item.description: "We are all a little weird. And we like to think that there is always someone weirder. I mean, I am sure some of you are looking at me and thinking, “Well, at least I am not as weird as you,” and I am thinking, “Well, at least I am not as weird as the people in the loony bin,” and the people in the loony bin are thinking, “Well, at least I am an orange”." -- Jim Gaffigan
